name: Mushroom Adventures
description:
Here's the game I'm doing right now with my friend. I finally finished the player controller and now the first prototype level is also ready. Test it and give feedback in the comment field.

The game supports a game controller and is at its best when played with it.

Keyboard

  • Action button = F
  • Move buttons = WASD
  • Jump = Space (In air double jump)
  • Toggle auto target = E
  • Walk = Lshift
  • Dash = Q
  • Look = Mouse
  • R = Restart game
  • ESC = Exit game

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controller

  • Action button = Button North
  • Jump = Button South  (In air double jump)
  • Toggle auto target = R1
  • Walk = L1
  • Dash = Button West
  • Move = Left stick
  • Look = Right stick
  • Shoot = Button East
